title.value: Estimated Date of Delivery Including Method

description.value: This value set contains codes to describe that the template in which they are used represents the estimated date of delivery. If the method of determination by which the date was estimated is known it is included in the code.

display.value: Delivery date Estimated from last menstrual period
Delivery date Estimated from ovulation date
Delivery date Estimated from conception date
Delivery date Estimated from date fundal height reaches umb
Delivery date Estimated from quickening date
Delivery date Estimated from prior gestational age assessment
